Jaguar racing formula e 2021

From the struggle of the pandemic that exhibited the importance of mutual support and credibility, arose a launch film for the 7th season of Formula E Championship of the Jaguar Racing Formula E Team as a result of full trust in creativity and craftsmanship.

Client

Studio Garcon

Design by

Tim Borst

This film presents Jaguar EVs, both civic and racing, in a world tour around cities, which planned to hold Formula E races in Season 7. It also shows how the Jaguar Electrify movement takes over the world by incorporating brand element from grill and racing livery decoration into famous citiesâ€™ landmarks.

Jaguar Racing Launch Film was used in communication during pre-season as well as in Jaguar electric vehicles promotion around the world.

That was a huge milestone, and we enjoyed making it. Thanks, Jag!
